item.description:
I need the same video and audio of the attached video but the graphics will be changed as well as the text at the end of the video. With the same format as the video. Please attach a quote with your offer so I know you have read the job post. Thank you!

item.title: Actor needed for 2 Short Social Media Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We're a start up looking for an actor to make 2 short social media videos for us. They have a few lines in them.

You've probably seen the trends on social media right now where there's a  funny "hook" video to get people's attention and then it splices into the actual video for the company. The video we need you to film will be after the hook.

The first video will require flour to be thrown onto the actor then deliver a few short lines.

The second video will require to the actor to roll off of a couch then deliver a few lines.

Please be US Based so we can send our product to you for the videos.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:39 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Male, Female
Skills: Acting, Male, Female
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: [Newark, NJ]: 90-second - 2-min promotional video featuring small business owner - [$500] - Upwork
item.description:
This short video (1:30 - 2:00 minutes in length) is for a small business that will be featured on Honeycomb Credit's investment platform. The business is raising investment capital through Honeycomb Credit and this video is critical in telling the story of the business and how they’re looking to grow. It will include a brief interview with the business owner (questions provided) as well as some b-roll within the location. We are also looking to receive 5-10 high-quality photos of the business owner and their products. This project features a local business.

Looking to schedule the shoot for sometime in the upcoming 2.5 weeks. We pay a $500 flat fee at the conclusion of the project. If this experience is beneficial for both parties, we would reach out with future job postings in the area.

Google Honeycomb Credit to check out our website!


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:31 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Skills: Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
